channel.title: [urgent] Chaotic rapier weaponhandler [delta]
channel.description:
I can't find anything to do with my weaponhandler.cfg i need something for it because nothing already exsisting has the same attacks. [code]//---Weapon-----Stand---Walk----Run----FightTy--Op1-----Op2-----Op3-----Op4---Block id = 18351 809 1146 1210 0 451 -1 -1 -1 -1[/code] i don't need anything for the run walk ect i just need it for the op1 op2 op3 op4 these are the attack options. anybody know the id's of the options cus i realy need them
thanks :P
